segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to tip over any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on is already tilted and unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why he's taking such a risk just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for him to share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's encouraging him to take more cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious to all of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm she looks while drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing and creating a huge mess, but she doesn't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall and make an even bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
